@wexlerwriting @JimRosenthal4 @EnergyVanguard The blog says portable air cleaners have to be plugged in. The electricity goes to power the fan that is needed to pull air through the filter media. Also there have been air cleaners with no fans in them. And guess what! These dont really work.
